title: A lone monster lunges from the shadow and attacks your party!
description: Your party is just minding it's business doing their thing, where a single monster lunges out of nowhere. It targets a random player and starts with advantage.
rewardTable: A love letter addressed to 'Little Geoffers' in Indran City'
dmNotes: Feel free to sub out the monster for something more thematically appropriate.

title: A whizzing sound grows...
description: A harsh whizzing sound begins growing as a rabid animal plummets from the sky like a comet.
rewardTable: Just the corpse of the animal
dmNotes: If the enemy generated cannot fly, sub in something different.

title: A group of random undead enemies attack!
description: What is this, Final Fantasy? It's just a ton of undead creatures attacking.
rewardTable: A piece of silver cutlery per enemy
dmNotes: This is a generic combat encounter for generic times.

title: An assassin lunges out of the dark and attacks!
description: If the assassin is undetected, he gets advantage on the player he attacks. The assassin is human, swathed in blue-black cloth and leather, and utterly silent. If subdued before dying, he will reveal his goal.
rewardTable: A bag containing 1 diamond, 2 rubies, and one emerald
The deed to a shack outside of Tiupran
dmNotes: Make the assassin's goal work into a plot beat. Also, have each party member roll a perception check at the begining of the encounter. A 20 will reveal the assassin, preventing advantage.

title: A small dog sprints past with a monster chasing it.
description: A small terrier sprints dashes out of nowhere. It is being chased by a lone monster.
rewardTable: Three gold teeth, valued at 2 gp each.
dmNotes: This should just be a fun basic encounter. The party should definitely be allowed to hang out with the dog after the encounter. Laziness or bad combat = dead dog.

title: A group of random enemies attacks!
description: Again, what is this? Final fantasy. Feel free to sub-out or add monsters as needed.
rewardTable: Three gold teeth, valued at 2 gp each.
dmNotes: This is the most basic encounter possible. But if you need some quick combat, it'll do the trick. You may wish to scale the rewards up a little.

title: A dragon attacks the ship!
description: A single dragon attacks the ship. It could be an enraged young dragon, or an elderly dragon.
rewardTable: 100 gold per CR level in the dragons stomach.
Three gold teeth, valued at 2 gp each.
A +2 magic weapon of DM's choice lodged in the stomach of the dragon.
dmNotes: If the dragon is older, it can talk and be spicy to the players.
